[[Konan]] morphs her right hand into paper and hits her opponent before spinning and doing the same with her left hand. She then sends two flurries of paper butterflies, separated by a spin, hovers toward her opponent covered in swirling paper that hits her opponent, and with a last attack, knocks her opponent far back.
